duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate, communicate & facilitate optimal provision of care utilizing digital platforms.
Assess, plan, implement, monitor & evaluate patient's plan of care from admission to discharge.
Utilize clinical knowledge & critical thinking skills to coordinate, implement & support the plan of care.
Ensure effective transition of care across the continuum.
Monitor quality metrics specific to the department & ensure complete & accurate documentation.
Act as mentor, clinician, educator, consultant/collaborator, and navigator.

education_certification.credential: Graduation from an accredited school of nursing and current licensure in the State of New York, with at least 1 year of experience. Baccalaureate degree in the Science of Nursing (BSN) preferred.
